items.sentence: I'm going to talk to Tom about that as soon as he gets home.
Tom was running around like a chicken with its head cut off.
Mary didn't know the person who had sent the flowers to her.
Buy two bottles of olive oil when you go to the supermarket.
Excuse me, could you show me how to use the washing machine?
Tom wanted the whole world to know he was in love with Mary.
Tom taught his younger brother how to make a paper airplane.
Tom asked the guy at the gas station to check his oil level.
Tom asked Mary to stop what she was doing and listen to him.
Tom and Mary don't live next door to John and Alice anymore.
